summary: Implements a suite of algorithms for measuring, estimating, and adapting network transmission bitrate, including inter‑arrival analysis, over‑use detection, AIMD rate control, and remote bitrate estimation, together with supporting utilities for rate tracking and timestamp grouping.
business_intent: Enable real‑time communication systems (e.g., video/audio streaming) to dynamically adjust sending rates based on observed network conditions, thereby preserving media quality while avoiding congestion.
